feed.title: LinuxGSM Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for LinuxGSM: v24.3.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat(vhserver): enable crossplay support by @glowacki-dev in https://github.com/GameServerManagers/LinuxGSM/pull/4544
  • feat: change curl default timeout to 3 seconds by @dgibbs64 in https://github.com/GameServerManagers/LinuxGSM/pull/4592
  • feat: deprecate Memories of Mars by @dgibbs64 in https://github.com/GameServerManagers/LinuxGSM/pull/4593
  • fix missing serverpassword detail by @dgibbs64 in https://github.com/GameServerManagers/LinuxGSM/pull/4596
  • feat(newserver): soulmask by @intel44 in https://github.com/GameServerManagers/LinuxGSM/pull/4590
  • feat(dev):add nocache if dev-debug is enabled by @dgibbs64 in https://github.com/GameServerManagers/LinuxGSM/pull/4597
  • refactor: minor refactor ofcheck_permissions.sh by @dgibbs64 in https://github.com/GameServerManagers/LinuxGSM/pull/4626
  • feat(newserver): add Xonotic by @Hornochs in https://github.com/GameServerManagers/LinuxGSM/pull/4633
  • feat(ut3): Update the UT3 archive to have OpenSpy fix by @dgibbs64 in https://github.com/GameServerManagers/LinuxGSM/pull/4657
  • build(deps): bump actions/add-to-project from 1.0.1 to 1.0.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/GameServerManagers/LinuxGSM/pull/4603
  • Release v24.3.0 by @dgibbs64 in https://github.com/GameServerManagers/LinuxGSM/pull/4658
  • feat(ut2k4): Update details to match other unreal 2 servers
  • feat(kf): Migrate to using valve query
  • feat(ro): Migrate to using valve query by default
  • feat(permissions): Attempt to fix non executable files issue
  • fix(restart): prevent restart from running if checks fail (4278)
  • feat: delete download of tar files when installed4458
  • refactor: refactor check_permissions.sh (#4626)
  • fix(samp): update samp url
  • fix(gamedig): ensure that node modules are valid
  • fix(mcb): timestamp disabled for MCB as breaks update check
  • feat: add debian 13
  • feat(deps): add Ubuntu 24.04

New Contributors

  • @glowacki-dev made their first contribution in https://github.com/GameServerManagers/LinuxGSM/pull/4544
  • @intel44 made their first contribution in https://github.com/GameServerManagers/LinuxGSM/pull/4590
  • @Hornochs made their first contribution in https://github.com/GameServerManagers/LinuxGSM/pull/4633

Full Changelog: https://github.com/GameServerManagers/LinuxGSM/compare/v24.2.4...v24.3.0

entry.title: New release for LinuxGSM: v24.3.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix(mcbserver): Wrong download url for serverfiles by @PlayMTL in https://github.com/GameServerManagers/LinuxGSM/pull/4675
  • Release v24.3.1 by @dgibbs64 in https://github.com/GameServerManagers/LinuxGSM/pull/4677

Full Changelog: https://github.com/GameServerManagers/LinuxGSM/compare/v24.3.0...v24.3.1
